title: Node stuck intermittently for BSC
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2022.07.2-alpha-c7a94eee`

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash : 

#### Expected behaviour
Node continue to sync

#### Actual behaviour

The node stopped to sync at block 19799710 without any action.

We already had same issue last week, but with an oldest version of erigon, so I updated the node to the last version available, but issue still happend 

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Start the node for bsc blockchain

#### Backtrace

````

Same issue on another server with another block
any fail logs like " Execution failed  "?

@flywukong yes we have some when it happend : 

````
Jul 23 10:44:54 rpc-bsc-erigon-prod-02 erigon[94968]: [INFO] [07-23|10:44:54.285] [6/16 Execution] Unwind Execution        from=19799711 to=19799710

This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
This issue was closed because it has been stalled for 7 days with no activity.
